mapper.select: select a.id, a.template_id, a.title, a.applicant_id, a.status, a.current_node_id, a.form_data, a.attachments, a.apply_time, a.finish_time, a.remark, a.create_time, a.update_time, u.nickname as applicant_name from im_approval a left join im_user u on a.applicant_id = u.id where a.id = #{id}

select id, template_id, title, applicant_id, status, current_node_id, form_data, attachments, apply_time, finish_time, create_time, update_time, remark from im_approval
and status = #{status} and applicant_id = #{userId} and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
order by create_time desc

select id, template_id, title, applicant_id, status, current_node_id, form_data, attachments, apply_time, finish_time, create_time, update_time, remark from im_approval where applicant_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc
select id, name, code, category, description, form_schema, flow_config, icon, is_system, status, sort_order, create_time, update_time from im_approval_template order by create_time desc
select id, name, code, category, description, form_schema, flow_config, icon, is_system, status, sort_order from im_approval_template where status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: update im_approval_template set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update im_approval set status = 'CANCELLED' where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) as total, sum(case when status = 'APPROVED' then 1 else 0 end) as approved, sum(case when status = 'REJECTED' then 1 else 0 end) as rejected, sum(case when status = 'PENDING' then 1 else 0 end) as pending from im_approval
and create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime}
